Text:
Hi malestrom,
I very much appreciate your torrents. It could not be done with out you.
One request, Could you please upload the "Sight & Sound" ,the monthly film magazine published by bfi( http://www.bfi.org.uk/sightandsound ) for us? It would be a graet help for the film lovers worldwide.
Thank you.
Thanks! I always rely on you for NS
